attributes.action: Recall parliament to vote on updated covid restrictions
attributes.additional_details: This material change impacts millions of people and should be deemed an event of national importance, enough to constitute the recalling of parliament
attributes.background: The introduction of a new tier as part of the  coronavirus restrictions equates to a substantial change to the legislation voted on by parliament on the 1st December. Parliament should have the chance to scrutinise the updated legislation as part of their core function under the UK constitution

rejection.details: The House of Commons has been recalled and will today be invited to approve the statutory instruments implementing new Covid-19 restrictions: https://commonsbusiness.parliament.uk/document/44115/html#_idTextAnchor009
